lines.text:
[to Dub]
You're just as stupid as you ever was!
Hey, isn't this breaking and entering?
We didn't break anything, fatso, so who cares if we enter?
Hey Dave. Freddy. You two lose young Jonny already?

[points to the snack bar]
Where there's food, there's Jon.
And, just for you, my friend, I've got two, I say two, fake barfs... and one with peas and carrots!
